Let’s Talk

We're more than a traditional film fund. Through our unique partnership with Viking Sunset Studios, we offer filmmakers comprehensive support from script to screen.

Where World-Class Production Meets Paradise Where World-Class Production Meets Paradise Where World-Class Production Meets Paradise Where World-Class Production Meets Paradise Where World-Class Production Meets Paradise

Pioneering the Future of Indonesian Cinema

Viking Film Fund stands as Indonesia's pioneering initiative bridging visionary filmmaking with professional execution. Established in 2022 as part of the Viking Sunset Group, we've committed ourselves to one clear mission: empowering Indonesian storytellers to create world-class cinema.

Our journey began with a simple observation – exceptional stories often remain untold due to resource constraints. Today, we're changing that narrative by providing not just funding, but complete access to professional production facilities, technical expertise, and industry networks.

At Viking Sunset Studios, our mission is clear: to create visual content that captivates audiences, regardless of genre, scale, or platform.

we believe great stories know no boundaries. Our commitment goes beyond traditional filmmaking – we embrace the entire spectrum of visual storytelling. From feature films to digital series, from intimate documentaries to grand productions, we support creators who dare to push creative boundaries.
